definitions.definition: a building or group of buildings where goods are manufactured or assembled chiefly by machine.
examples: plant, works, yard, mill, workshop, shop; Moreinformalsweatshop, salt mine(s) "jobs in the factories were getting harder to find"Moresweatshop, salt mine(s) jobs in the factories were getting harder to find

definitions.definition: a person, group, or institution that continually produces a great quantity of something specified.
examples: a huge factory of lying, slander, and bad English

definitions.definition: an establishment for traders carrying on business in a foreign country.
